title: Corrie's Sinead death scenes 'ruined' for viewers by Daniel appearing to 'teleport'

Coronation Street viewers have been watching tragic scenes unfold this week in the lead up to Sinead Tinker's harrowing death.

Despite the heart wrenching scenes on Thursday's episode causing fans to well up, eagle-eyed viewers spotted a flaw in the filming which led to them joking that Sinead's husband Daniel was "teleporting" around the cobbles.

Feeling distracted by the blunder, Corrie fans took to Twitter to discuss how Daniel's speedy movements "ruined" the tragic storyline.

One asked: "Did Daniel teleport? That was a quick wash/dress/walk over #Corrie."

Another jibbed: "Daniel got ready quick blimey."

Thinking the same, another quizzed: "right so did Daniel just teleport into the room?"

(Image: ITV)

Others typed: "F**king hell, does everyone own a Tardis suddenly!" and "Bloody hell. Daniel got washed, changed and refreshed literally in the blink of an eye."

A micro-blogger contributed: "Wow, Daniel got over there quick! Did he jaunt?"

In Thursday's episode of Coronation Streer, Sinead woke up and initially had no recollection of her blazing row with Daniel that was aired on Wednesday's instalment.

She then remembered what happened, but is determined to forget about her husband and went on to film some home videos for her son Bertie to remember her by.

(Image: ITV)

Sinead wanted to make sure Bertie realised how much she loved him, knowing that she will miss his first birthday, his first day at school and his wedding day.

Elsewhere, the Barlows were frantic with worry when Daniel failed to return home.

Dastardly Daniel passed out by the canal after downing a bottle of vodka.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

After gazing at Bertie's dummy, which had 'mummy's boy' written on, Daniel went for another swig of booze.

But he passed out and the bottle fell out of his hand and rolled away to the edge of the water.

This came after Sinead discovered Bethany Platt's notebook and came to a shocking realisation.

(Image: ITV)

She asked Daniel what was going on with Bethany, but he struggled to give a straight answer and dug himself a bigger hole.

Daniel eventually confessed that he had kissed Bethany - leaving Sinead to throw him out.

description: The tragic scenes - that brought a tear to viewers' eyes - were 'ruined' for some fans because of Sinead's husband Daniel appearing to 'teleport'
